definitions.definition: The wife of a count or earl .
A woman holding the rank of count or earl in her own right; a female holder of an earldom .
examples: Elizabeth Millicent Leveson-Gower is 24th Countess of Sutherland; her son will be the 25th Earl.

main_definition: The wife of a count or earl .
secondary_definitions: A woman holding the rank of count or earl in her own right; a female holder of an earldom .
